com.compomics.util.experiment.massspectrometry.indexes

Class SpectrumIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.compomics.util.experiment.massspectrometry.indexes.SpectrumIndex
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UrParameter, Serializable

    public class SpectrumIndex
extends Object
implements UrParameter
    This map stores the fragment ions indexed by mass.
    Author:
    Marc Vaudel
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpectrumIndex

        public SpectrumIndex()
        Constructor for an empty index.

      • SpectrumIndex

        public SpectrumIndex(HashMap<Double,Peak> peaks,
                     double intenstiyLimit,
                     double tolerance,
                     boolean ppm)
        Builds a new index.
        Parameters:
        peaks - map of the peaks indexed by m/z
        intenstiyLimit - a lower limit for the intensity of the peaks to index
        tolerance - the tolerance to use
        ppm - boolean indicating whether the tolerance is in ppm

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the peaks matching the given m/z

      • getBins

        public ArrayList<Integer> getBins()
        Returns the bins in the map as a list. The list is created every time me method is called.
        Returns:
        the bins in the map

      • getPeaksInBin

        Returns the peaks at the given bin indexed by m/z. Null if none found.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the peaks at the given bin
